meanings.definition: The process of making an area more urban in character.
meanings.sent1: The urbanisations in the city included building tall skyscrapers.
meanings.sent2: After the urbanisations, the town had more traffic and taller buildings.
meanings.sent3: The urbanisations in the small village made the cows curious about the new buildings.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic vision transformed the urbanisations into a vibrant cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The urbanisations brought a modern feel to the once quiet neighborhood.

meanings.definition: The result of urbanizing an area.
meanings.sent1: The urbanisations of the town led to increased population density.
meanings.sent2: We could see the urbanisations in the form of new apartment complexes.
meanings.sent3: The urbanisations surprised the birds who were used to open fields.
meanings.sent4: The urbanisations painted the landscape with a touch of modernity.
meanings.sent5: The urbanisations transformed the sleepy town into a bustling city.
